TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {527167=SOURCE: U.S. Department of Transportation, Research and Innovative Technology Administration, Bureau of Transportation Statistics and U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Census Bureau, 2007 Economic Census: Transportation Commodity Flow Survey, December 2009., 16471=[Estimates are based on final data from the 2007 Commodity Flow Survey. Because of rounding, estimates may not be additive], 526189=1 Based on 2002 North American Industry Classification System (NAICS). NAICS1 is a hierarchical coding system and certain codes may be nested. For example, estimates for value and tons summed from NAICS1 codes 4231 through 4239 equal the estimates of values and tons for NAICS1 code 423. 2 Ton-miles estimates are based on estimated distances traveled along a modeled transportation network. 3 Coefficient of Variation.}
